The new tab features a professional guidance video to help you relax, meditate and breath better

Breatie is a new tab extension which sets your new tab to a relaxing first page, making breathing and meditation exercise always accesible.

The search features in the extension are provided by Microsoft Bing.
By clicking "Add to chrome", I accept and agree to installing Breathie extension and setting the New tab to that provided by Microsoft Bing, Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.
